DOC.brief_summary: To determine accuracy specification Pulse oximeter .
DOC.brief_title: Pulse Oximetry_Performance Testing- PCBA-1 ( Printed Circuit Board Assembly )
DOC.criteria: 1 . Male female subject age 18 50 year ( inclusive ) . 2 . Must undergo physical examination license physician , advanced practice nurse physician assistant , include 12 lead ECG , medical history , blood test check complete blood count screen sickle cell trait disease 3 . All female volunteer must negative urine pregnancy test prior participation . 1 . Pregnancy lactate woman 2 . Unexplained syncopal episode 3 . Hypertension ( define systolic pressure > 145 mmHg diastolic pressure > 90 mm Hg three consecutive reading ) 4 . Premature ventricular contraction ( PVC 's ) symptomatic occur rate 5/minute 5 . History seizure ( except childhood febrile seizure ) epilepsy 6 . Routine use tranquilizer and/or excessive anxiety 7 . History frequent headache migraine 8 . History stroke 9 . Previous injury trauma finger hand may change blood flow vascular supply affect ability test multiple sensor 10 . History `` altitude sickness '' define headache , malaise dizziness mountains aircraft altitude significantly sea level prolonged period time ( > 1 hour ) 11 . History significant respiratory disease , severe asthma , emphysema , etc . 12 . Sickle cell disease trait . 13 . The use medication , preexist medical condition , treatment medical condition reason deem relevant clinician conducting study . 14 . Abnormal ECG find 15 . Prior known allergy lidocaine ( similar pharmacologic agent , e.g. , Novocain ) 16 . Prior known allergy heparin . 17 . History transient ischemic attack carotid artery disease 18 . History myocardial ischemia , angina , myocardial infarction , congestive heart failure cardiomyopathy 19 . History chronic renal impairment 20 . History recent arterial cannulation ( less 1 month prior study ) 21 . History complication previous arterial cannulation 22 . Current use blood thinner
